about_the_game:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* + Premium set of clothes and weapons.
Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
detailed_description:
Hello everyone, we are happy to announce Anarchy: Supporter pack. This is a bundle of extra goodies for the people who want to go another extra mile to support.

The Anarchy: Supporter Pack includes the following digital items:
* + Premium set of clothes and weapons.
Thank you for your support as we design the best economic action survival shooter for you. AWL team.
name: Anarchy: Supporter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 470 GTX or AMD Radeon 6870 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel or AMD processor, 3.0 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 970 GTX or AMD Radeon 570 HD series card or higher
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: This content requires the base game on Steam in order to play
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian*, Turkish, Japanese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
